articles.description: Keep an eye on earnings and the price action in popular tech stocks.
articles.title: Stocks are at an inflection point — this is what to expect if you believe in technical analysis
articles.author: Nigam Arora
articles.content:
The U.S. stock market is at an inflection point. The key question for investors is, What is next?
Some traditional TA (technical analysis) believers see a breakout happening.
Let us explore with the help of a chart if you believe in traditional technical an… [+2998 chars]

articles.description: Two companies report earnings and one insider spends $4.3 million on Activision Blizzard stock.
articles.title: Tech Stocks This Week: MongoDB Soars, an Insider Loads Up on Activision Stock, and More
articles.content: This week's tech stock news includes earnings reports from cross-platform cloud-based database company MongoDB(NASDAQ: MDB) and software giant Adobe(NASDAQ: ADBE), as well a massive insider stock purchase of gaming company Activision Blizzard(NASDAQ: ATVI) am… [+2928 chars]

articles.description: Disruption plus enterprise software equals market-smashing returns.
articles.title: Disruptor Alert: These 3 Companies Are Changing Enterprise Software
articles.content: Disruption may be an overused term in investing, but if you can find a truly disruptive company, you could see staggering returns. Disruptive companies come to market with a new way of doing things -- either a new kind technology, product, or business model -… [+5622 chars]
